content: additional information * there s now an alternate technique for the eyes if you don t want to cut the yarn for each set scroll down to the end of the pattern page * shawl charts have been added this project now contains a link to a 1-page downloadable pdf of the charts * shawl chart and written english pattern us code using alternative eyes here 3 1 http //www ravelry com/projects/coudreducoeur/skull-shawl-doskallesjal 2 https //www dropbox com/s/gppqojwo5npjovn/totenkopf%20dreiecktuch%20%28katharina%20rutenberg%26farida%20denger%29 pdf m 3 http //www ravelry com/projects/wolfscarlet87/skull-shawl-doskallesjal
